channel.title: Using the client's method outside of the client dc's me Please don't ignore]
channel.description: Title says it. In a file outside of the client class, trying to use variables and methods from the inside. I tried client c; and putting c. in front of the variable/method. No errors, but I disconnect when the method from outside the client is called from within the client.

item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Title says it. In a file outside of the client class, trying to use variables and methods from the inside. I tried client c; and putting c. in front of the variable/method. No errors, but I disconnect when the method from outside the client is called from within the client.
